analysis.description:
DrupeICORef.fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2795a7bf26de447a2e83d0779bab6badffb1a3b.sol#35-39) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_ico.purchase.value(msg.value)(msg.sender,_referrer) (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2795a7bf26de447a2e83d0779bab6badffb1a3b.sol#35-39)

DrupeICO.fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2795a7bf26de447a2e83d0779bab6badffb1a3b.sol#142-157) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_drupe.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2795a7bf26de447a2e83d0779bab6badffb1a3b.sol#151)

DrupeICO.purchase (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2795a7bf26de447a2e83d0779bab6badffb1a3b.sol#161-184) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_drupe.transfer(payout,tokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2795a7bf26de447a2e83d0779bab6badffb1a3b.sol#173-174)
	-_drupe.transfer(referrer,refTokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2795a7bf26de447a2e83d0779bab6badffb1a3b.sol#175-176)

DrupeICO.burnUnsoldTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2795a7bf26de447a2e83d0779bab6badffb1a3b.sol#188-195) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_drupe.transfer(address(0),unsoldTokens) (/unique_chucks/28/0xa2795a7bf26de447a2e83d0779bab6badffb1a3b.sol#193-195)
